title: Mr Robot drops mind-bending twist in final season: Who is the Other One?
text:
Elliot and Mr Robot have company thanks to a shock twist (Picture: Channel USA)

Mr Robot is currently airing its mind-bending final season, but the Rami Malek drama has just dropped its most insane twist yet causing viewers to re-think everything they know.

In the closing moments in last night’s episode, fans were gifted with a flashback to a younger Elliot (his older self played by Malek) and his mother Magda (Vaishnavi Sharma).

In the clip, Magda tells her son to wait for the ‘other one’ to come, revealing that Elliot actually has a third, previously hidden personality.

Elliot’s other personality, Mr Robot (Christian Slater), is the spitting image of his dead father. The introduction of another potential narrator has some fans spinning out.

ELLIOT HAS A THIRD PERSONALITY the fandom rn: WTF. #MrRobot pic.twitter.com/kXknEVQoh2 — fabi| mr robot spoilers (@beautifulrami) October 14, 2019

So…who is this kid? What does he know about Elliot and Mr. Robot? And who is the other one?? WHAT. IS. HAPPENING???? #MrRobot #DatBot pic.twitter.com/0JrLEUZ6JG — Black Girl Nerds (@BlackGirlNerds) October 14, 2019

Advertisement

Advertisement

Could there even be four personalities fighting control of Elliot’s head space?

The final scene is interesting, it actually suggests their are 4 of them. Mr. Robot, Elliot, the boy and who they are waiting for. Why would the boy refer to himself as the person they are waiting for after all. #MrRobot — 💚when the spotlight fades💙 (@shipperbyheart) October 14, 2019

I need to rewatch… all the mf seasons because of this one goddamn episode alone. #MrRobot — arika (@PurpleCaliSkies) October 14, 2019

We think this calls for a major re-watch too, especially considering that the tech thriller’s showrunner Sam Esmail recently revealed to The Hollywood Reporter the twist has been planned for a very long time.

When asked how long this particular plot point has been in the pipeline, the creator simply said: ‘The beginning [of the show].

‘This is the beginning of that big final reveal of the whole series. Honestly, it’s one where I haven’t quite… you know, I go on the subreddit, I read theories, I listen to podcasts. This is one that hasn’t been predicted yet.’

The high-stakes thriller made a star out of Malek (Picture: Channel USA)

Footage from the final season of the high-tech drama has already promised us that we’re entering dangerous territory.

The Oscar-winning actor is also getting ready to star in the newest James Bond film, No Time to Die, where he will be playing the villain.

Mr Robot is available to stream on Amazon Prime.

description: The Rami Malek-starring tech thriller just dropped its biggest twist yet, confirming that Elliot has a third, previously un-seen personality.
